name: The Adventure Of Frog
description:
The Adventure Of Frog is a 2d platformer where you, the player, are a frog; traversing through 2 stages to get to the end, while collecting as many yummy bananas on the way! This is my first ever game I made so I hope you enjoy playing it as much as I was making it!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

V1.1 added a new level, as well as a proper start and end screen and a new enemy! Fixed a bug where the banana text showed up in the middle left of the screen.
